title: Lapis Development Sample
description:
Blue dominates.  Plain weave or Twill variation.
Similar to Pomegranate. Blue, drk teal & olive warp. Lt & med green weft. Plain weave variation.  Right selvedge.  
Tag \"#4\" attached to pc.  In mat folder with 99.1.213.20, 21, 23. Inside folder has Lasen descriptive information. \"H-8B\" written on outside. (blues & greens)
